title: 100 Unfortunate Days
description: Warning: This book might NOT be for you.A black hearted diary--and not for the faint of heart.If you found a diary you might take a peek--if you found the diary of a madwoman, how could you turn away. 100 UNFORTUNATE DAYS book brings a realization that the mad walk among us--and me BE us.
author: Penelope Crowe
